data.name: pattern_AddRelationshipEvent
data.value:
h1. New Event Added to "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}" $__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has added a new event to "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}": $AdditionalData.get_item("EventContent")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you don't want to receive the notifications about new events added within the CRM module, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_CreateNewContact
data.value:
h1. CRM. New Contact Created Using 'Website Contact Form':"$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Default.aspx?ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime A new contact has been created using 'Website Contact Form':"$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Default.aspx?ID=$EntityID"
#foreach($contactInfo in $AdditionalData.Keys) #each
$contactInfo: $AdditionalData.get_item($contactInfo)
#end
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you don't want to receive the noifications about new contacts added to CRM, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_ExportCompleted
data.value:
h1. CRM. 데이터가 성공적으로 완료 내보내기
Please, follow this link to download the archive: "exportdata.zip":"${EntityRelativeURL}".
*Note*: this link is valid for 24 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support.onlyoffice.com":"http://support.onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you don't want to receive the notifications about data export, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_ResponsibleForTask
data.value:
h1.Task Assigned to You: $EntityTitle
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has appointed you responsible for the task: $EntityTitle. #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory"))
Task category: $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory") #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl"))
Link with contact: "$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl"))
Link with case: "$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl"))
Link with opportunity: "$AdditionalData.get_item("DealTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")&&$AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")!="")
Task description: $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription") #end
Due date: $AdditionalData.get_item("DueDate")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
Go to the "Tasks":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Tasks.aspx" list.
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_SetAccess
data.value:
h1.Access Granted to "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has granted you the access to "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}".
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you don't want to receive the notifications about the access granted to the CRM items, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: subject_AddRelationshipEvent
data.value: CRM. $EntityTitle 에 추가 하는 새 이벤트

data.name: subject_CreateNewContact
data.value: CRM. 'Website Contact Form'을 사용 하여 만든 새 연락처
